title: How One Woman Risked the Great Migration, and Found Opportunity in a New Life
description: Dorothy Glinton took a chance by moving from Florida to Chicago. It paid off, for her and her family.
dc:creator: Peter Kujawinski and Erin Kirkland for The New York Times
media:description: Dorothy Glinton in the South Shore neighborhood of Chicago, a city she has called home for nearly 60 years.
